name: torrow-mcp-service
description: MCP server for Torrow service - manages Notes and Archives

scripts.dev-inspector: set DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=1&& set CLIENT_PORT=8080&& set SERVER_PORT=9000&& set DOTENV_CONFIG_DEBUG=false&& npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector tsx src/index.ts
scripts.inspector: set DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=1&& set CLIENT_PORT=8080&& set SERVER_PORT=9000&& set DOTENV_CONFIG_DEBUG=false&& npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js

author: Torrow MCP Service
